name: After Dinner
description: This delicious dessert is perfect for when friends and family are around the table.

name: Bed Time
description: This pure Indica strain is designed to slow things down.

name: Bedica
description: The latest variety is Bedica, an “Indica” variety.

name: Bediol
description: Cannabis Flos variety Bediol is a combination THC/CBD Sativa.

name: Bedrocan
description: Developed in the Netherlands out of a requirement by the Dutch Health Ministry to have at least one “high THC” variety available to patients.

name: Bedrolite
description: The Bedrolite variety is a “Sativa” with medium CBD and very low THC content.

name: Bedropuur
description: Cannabis Flos variety Bedropuur (pronounced “pure”) is a high THC Indica variety.

name: Good Morning
description: Wake up and feel alive. All natural with a rich tropical perfume with mango, citrus and floral overtones.

name: Lunch Break
description: A refreshing wake up call to combat the 3pm blues, with a unique revitalizing taste.
